speaker: Corom Thomposon
title: Using Cognitive Search to Understand the JFK Documents
description:
In this episode Corom Thomposon shows powerful pattern for extracting meaning from a large set of unstructured documents. This demonstration shows the power of both Cognitive Services, Azure Search, and a number of other techniques to both visualize and explore the latest set of information released by the government pertaining to the JFK assassination.

Create a Free Account (Azure): https://aka.ms/azft-ai
